strings.Value: "I'm glad you managed to reunite with your king."
"I've never met such an old kobold before. How did you manage to survive this long?"
"You're fine company, but I must be going."
"How do you like your new home?"
"You've obviously seen much in your long life. I wish you could understand me."
[Attack] "Don't get too comfortable! It's time to entertain me!"
{n}You see a familiar face â€” the kobold shaman you met in the forest. He stares at you with unblinking eyes as he works to speak through his sharp-toothed jaws.{/n} "Greetingsss!"

{n}A kobold much older than his surrounding kin is sitting on the ground. The skin around his eyes is dry and wrinkled, and his hide is missing many scales, covered with scars and strange stains. Seeing you approach, the old kobold turns his head to look at you closely.{/n} "Greetingsss!"
{n}The kobold shaman turns his head to look at you.{/n} "Greetingsss!"
"Tartuk. Home. Love." {n}The kobold looks at you with his strange, impenetrable gaze.{/n}
{n}The kobold continues to stare at you blankly.{/n}
{n}The kobold simply opens his mouth as he continues to look at you. It's unclear if there's any special intent to the gesture.{/n}
